snippet: The young jazz singer Brianna Thomas, who played at Dizzy’s Club Coca-Cola on Monday, begins a bigger journey with the release of her new album.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by jazz singer Brianna Thomas at Dizzy's Club Coca-Cola.
lead_paragraph: The young jazz singer Brianna Thomas, who played at Dizzy’s Club Coca-Cola on Monday, begins a bigger journey with the release of her new album.

headline.seo: Brianna Thomas Releases ‘You Must Believe in Love’
headline.main: Off to a Bigger Journey, After Years in the World of ’30s-Style Swing Music
headline.print_headline: Off to a Bigger Journey, After Years in the World of ’30s-Style Swing Music
